entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.3°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 80 %

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Becoming partly cloudy this afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12 with temperature falling to minus 15 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 02 January 2023
